parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the savings plan instance.

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description:
The language of the return data. Valid values:

*   ZH: Chinese
*   EN: English

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the Instance. 

*  NORMAL
* RELEASE
